column2: used in the Legendarium to denote such people that belonged to a certain leader
column3: or that were the descendants of a common fore-father.

column2: -ung (derived from Wikipedia:Proto-Germanic language *unga): Forming derivatives of masculine nouns with sense of "belonging to
